original_text: “Listen to the terms of this covenant and tell them to the people of Judah and to those who live in Jerusalem.
korean_text: 너희는 이 언약의 말을 듣고 유다인과 예루살렘 주민에게 말하라

sentences.original_text: Listen to the terms of this covenant
and tell them to the people of Judah
and to those who live in Jerusalem
